title: PROJECT question
body:
If I have the icon for say.. Katarina, but don't have the skin itself, once I get the skin, will I have the border?
If there's already been a discussion please feel free to link me it, otherwise I'd love an answer.

Thanks.

replies.body:
It really depends on when you get the skin.

+ If you get your **PROJECT: Katarina** skin BEFORE the 17th of August then you'll receive a first strike border for that skin. 

+ If you get **PROJECT: Katarina** skin AFTER the 17th of August then you will not be eligible for a first strike border.

I hope that helps :)
